thread.title: CFIUS orders Qualcomm to delay shareholder meeting

title: CFIUS orders Qualcomm to delay shareholder meeting
text:
CFIUS orders Qualcomm to delay shareholder meeting 8:52pm GMT - 01:42 
The Committee on Foreign Investment in the U.S. ordered chipmaker Qualcomm to postpone its annual shareholder meeting for 30 days so that it can investigate its rival Broadcom's $117 bln takover bid for the company. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The Committee on Foreign Investment in the U.S. ordered chipmaker Qualcomm to postpone its annual shareholder meeting for 30 days so that it can investigate its rival Broadcom's $117 bln takover bid for the company.
